subject: Rugby
lead_paragraph: When the Hurricanes host the Brumbies in one final and the Highlanders visit the Waratahs in the other, 17 Kiwi stars won't be thinking about the All Blacks.
snippet: When the Hurricanes host the Brumbies in one final and the Highlanders visit the Waratahs in the other, 17 Kiwi stars won't be thinking about the All Blacks.
